string.value:
There's no better time for Bingo than in the middle of a dreary winter! Check the Bingo board every day and receive some awesome prizes when you've filled up the entire Bingo board! Try making it to the game every day!

<Event Periods>
February 22, 2010 - March 26, 2010

string.name: summary
string.value: Gather 20 #b#t4032419#s#k dropped by monsters and take them to Cassandra.

We're already in the middle of winter. Time flies, doesn't it? Feels like there should be an event to cheer up this dreary time of year. I know! How about Winter Bingo? Find 20 Bingo Necklaces from monsters, and I'll put a stamp on your Bingo Board.
The event will start now! You must bring me 20 Bingo Necklaces!\n\n#i4032419# 20 #t4032419#s
You know, if you fill up your Bingo Board, you'll get a treasure chest full of items. Are you sure you're not interested?
